entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unit test projects can't reference Maui multi target projects #3552
  • VS 17.1.0 Preview 1.1 is using the complete absolute Path for BundleResources for SmartCopy Task for iOS #3551
  • Namespace names in MAUI. #3548

Closed

  • .NET Maui Custom Handlers not working, official docs is wrong? #3550
  • BlazorWebView WPF/WinForms build targets are not in NUPKG #3533
    6.0.200-preview.11

PullRequests

Merged

  • [iOS, Windows, Android] Button border properties #3411
    area/controls 🎮
  • BlazorWebView WPF/WinForms build targets need to go into NUPKG #3532
    area/blazor 🕸️

Updated

  • Update Essentials Screenshot API, capture native frames. #3529
    partner/ui-tools, area/essentials 🍞
  • Setup first set of Automation Properties #3222
    area/a11y
  • Move most of the types in the Platform folder to the Platform namespaces #3495
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
